name: Baldi`s Easy Mode(BEM) (BB+ mod)
description:
Hello! Welcome to Baldi`s Easy Mode! a mod for Baldi`s Basics Plus that`s makes this game much more easier

Its still a subject to be changed andd updated, ok?

INSTRUCTIONS

1. Download assembly

2. Go to BALDI_Data

3. Open Managed

4. Drag assembly into the managed folder

5. replace the assemby with new one

6. start playing
